name: Luminos Clarity 27" 8K
description: First consumer 8K monitor at 27 inches with 7680x4320 resolution. Features quantum dot technology, 1000 nit HDR, and built-in AI upscaling for lower resolution content.

reviews.review_text: 8K at 27 inches is unreal. Every pixel invisible.
AI upscaling makes 4K content look native.
Needs serious GPU power for 8K gaming.
